body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Patterson Motors. My name is Joe Patterson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Patricia. Can you please provide me with your phone number and email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven seven zero - five five five - eight eight one one. And my email address is patricia dot peterson at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. Could you also confirm your physical address for our system as well, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my address is twenty three one Maple Street, Cityville, State ABC, Zip Code nine zero one zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I have updated your details in our system, Patricia. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that covers it. Thank you for your help, Joe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Patricia. Thank you for reaching out to Patterson Motors. Have a great day!
